name: Cogwheel-sm
snippet: This small toothy monster can be combined to create the smoothest change in speed or direction of the motion.

name: Cogwheel-med
snippet: This medium toothy monster can be combined to create the smoothest change in speed or direction of the motion.

name: Cogwheel-large
snippet: This large toothy monster can be combined to create the smoothest change in speed or direction of the motion.

name: Micro Sensor Series 3000
snippet: Even the tiniest variation in the magnetism will trigger this little wonder.

name: Twirly-Whirly-Sm
snippet: Give the power of flight to your contraptions with these small light-weight motorized rotors.

name: Twirly-Whirly-Medium
snippet: Give the power of flight to your contraptions with these medium light-weight motorized rotors.
